field.name: role
field.description: Whether to be a receiver or transmitter

field.name: version
field.description: Version

field.name: tx_source
field.description: The source for channel data on an OpenLRS transmitter.

field.name: tx_scale_min
field.description: Minimum value for tx scaling (corresponds to 100% stick travel in negative direction)

field.name: tx_scale_max
field.description: Maximum value for tx scaling (corresponds to 100% stick travel in positive direction)

field.name: tx_startup_bind_duration
field.description: How long the transmitter should wait for binding at startup.

field.name: tx_bind_button_duration
field.description: How long the transmitter should wait for binding when the bind button is pressed.

field.name: data_source
field.description: Where the "data connection" should be connected. For UAVO telemetry, pick UavoTelemetry. To be a transparent bridge, pick ComBridge.

field.name: rf_frequency
field.description: Radio Frequency

field.name: rf_magic
field.description: Radio Magic. This constant ensures that we only exchange frames wth radios we are bound with.

field.name: rf_power
field.description: Radio Power

field.name: rf_channel_spacing
field.description: Channel spacing in kilohertz.

field.name: hopchannel
field.description: Array of hop channels. First zero terminates list.

field.name: modem_params
field.description: Modem parameters: this sets the link speed

field.name: flags
field.description: Flags sets the channel mappings and whether telemetry is present.

field.name: ext_flags
field.description: Extended flags

field.name: beacon_frequency
field.description: When link is lost, a series of tones is played periodically on this frequency. The default value is FRS channel 7.

field.name: beacon_delay
field.description: After link is lost, wait this long before sending beacon on beacon_frequency

field.name: beacon_period
field.description: Beacons are repeated at this interval, or may be triggered manually by transmitting on this frequency.

field.name: RSSI_Type
field.description: RSSI Type
